Summary: I observed two disc shaped objects traveling due north in formation, the right lead, and the #2 in the eight-o-clock, traveling from overhead to the two -o-clock position at which time the right and then the left rose into a cloud.
divs: sighting details8 feb 06, 1250 hrs, mcalester army ammunition plant, outfield secure area, next to the container outload facility, i often watch the aircraft,jetstreams, of the plains comming out of dfw airport 175 miles to the south, as i looked overhead i observed two disc shaped objects, traveling north in formation, the right\lead and the left at the 8-o-clock position, their altitude when i first saw them was approx. a quater at arms length, when last seen, a nickle at the 2-o-clock high position, the center section of the disc's were redish\rust color with a gray\bluegray outer edge, i didn't know they came in multicolors?. the duration of the observation was one minute fourtyfive seconds, when last seen the right\lead object rose stright up into a cloud and then the second, his wingman did the same, these were no convential aircraft, x- oh-6 pilot, air observer scout 101st ab, 5th special forces group, recon. needless to say we can have no cameras where i work, i guess i could draw them but not using computer graphics. i have seen smaller silvery objects tailing jet's on two other times, one did a 180 and rose up when another aircraft came out of the clouds.
